casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Matthew PUGH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017

John L. Cordani, Jr., assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 518, 170 A.3d 710 (2017), is denied.
